summary: He’s now another owner of NFTs “worth essentially nothing”
title: Logan Paul’s NFT Collection, Once Worth $2.8 Million, Has Lost 70% Of Its Value
detailed_content: In the summer of 2021, NFTs were enjoying their first boom period, fuelled by crazy stories like the $69 million sale of Beeple’s ‘The First 5000 Days’ digital artwork and the ensuing tidal wave of FOMO.
author: Stephen Moore
